Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.persistence.field

Annotation Interface Persist

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface Persist
Allows to define the persistence of individual fields to NodeSettings if field based persistence is used.
Author:
Adrian Nembach, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    configKey
    Optional argument that defines the key under which to store the field in the NodeSettings.
    Class<? extends FieldNodeSettingsPersistor>
    customPersistor
    Optional argument that allows to specify a custom persistor for a field.
    Class<? extends DefaultProvider>
    defaultProvider
    Optional argument that allows to provide a DefaultProvider that provides the default value for a setting that may not be part of the node settings e.g.
    boolean
    hidden
    Optional argument that allows to hide a setting in the flow variable tab.
    boolean
    optional
    Optional argument that allows to make a setting optional.
    Class<? extends org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModel>
    settingsModel
    Optional argument for nodes that previously used SettingsModels for persistence.

  • Element Details

    • configKey

      String configKey
      Optional argument that defines the key under which to store the field in the NodeSettings. The key is generated from the field name by stripping any leading 'm_' prefix if this argument is left empty (the default) or consists only of whitespaces.
      Returns:
      the key under which to store the field in the NodeSettings.
      Default:
      ""

    • customPersistor

      Class<? extends FieldNodeSettingsPersistor> customPersistor
      Optional argument that allows to specify a custom persistor for a field. For accessing the configKey() within this persistor use a subclass of NodeSettingsPersistorWithConfigKey. Otherwise the configKey() is ignored whenever a customPersistor is defined.
      Returns:
      the class of the customPersistor
      Default:
      org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.persistence.field.FieldNodeSettingsPersistor.class

    • settingsModel

      Class<? extends org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModel> settingsModel
      Optional argument for nodes that previously used SettingsModels for persistence. Provide the class of the SettingsModel used previously in order to get an equivalent persistor.
      Returns:
      the type of SettingsModel previously used for persistence
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no equivalent persistor available for the combination of field type and SettingsModel
      Default:
      org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModel.class

    • hidden

      boolean hidden
      Optional argument that allows to hide a setting in the flow variable tab.
      Returns:
      true if the setting should be hidden in the flow variable tab.
      Default:
      false

    • optional

      boolean optional
      Optional argument that allows to make a setting optional. An optional settings is a settings that may be in the NodeSettings when loading but doesn't have to be. If it isn't present, then the default value from the declaring DefaultNodeSettings class is used. The typical use-case for this are settings that are added in a later release. This argument is overruled by defaultProvider() if provided. Does not apply to custom persistors.
      Returns:
      true if the setting is optional
      Default:
      false

    • defaultProvider

      Class<? extends DefaultProvider> defaultProvider
      Optional argument that allows to provide a DefaultProvider that provides the default value for a setting that may not be part of the node settings e.g. because it was added in a later release.
      If the default for newly created settings is the same as for loaded settings, use optional() instead. If provided, a defaultProvider overrules optional(). Does not apply to custom persistors.
      Returns:
      the class of DefaultProvider
      See Also:
      • optional()
      Default:
      org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.persistence.field.DefaultProvider.class
